column4: i dont understand something about ubuntu. i installed amarok and it said that it would take up 131MB of additional space. when i uninstalled it, it said it would free up 31MB. so what happened to the other 100MB ???
That 131mb prob consists of other libraries that amarok needs but that won't get uninstalled when you uninstall amark.
You can as long as other programs don't rely on those libraries.
